questiontext.text: The distribution of water requirements (in liters) during a flight from Amsterdam to New York has an average of 3 liters per passenger and a variation of 1.6. Suppose you take a random flight with 250 passengers, what is the distribution of this sample?

answer.text: It is normally distributed with a mean of 1.5 and standard deviation of 0.08.

feedback.text: It is normally distributed with a mean of 1.5 and standard deviation of 0.08…: Incorrect

answer.text: It is normally distributed with a mean of 3 and standard deviation of 0.08.

feedback.text: It is normally distributed with a mean of 3 and standard deviation of 0.08…: Correct

answer.text: It is normally distributed with a mean of 3 and standard deviation of 1.27.

feedback.text: It is normally distributed with a mean of 3 and standard deviation of 1.27.: Incorrect Incorrect

answer.text: It is normally distributed with a mean of 3 and standard deviation of 1.6.

feedback.text: It is normally distributed with a mean of 3 and standard deviation of 1.6: Incorrect
